attributes.action: Make sure the new Tottenham Hotspur Stadium is called the "The Bill Nicholson Stadium"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bill Nicholson was never truly honoured in the way he should have been.

What better way to acknowledge his / our achievements than to name the new stadium after Mr Tottenham himself.

rejection.details: This should be a matter for direct communication with the FA.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
